name: True Alien Love
description:
Please DOWNLOAD the PC version. That one doesn't crash!!

This game is for the Brackeys GameJam. This is also the first game I made on my own. So, I know it has a bunch of bugs that I couldn't figure out how to fix them. 

I'm aware that the game crashes when you play it on the browser. So please take a moment to download it and play it on your PC. It would really help me to receive your feedback.

I love u n.n <3
